snippet: Djokovic dominated both tiebreakers at the BNP Paribas Open on Friday, setting up a semifinal against Nadal. Serena Williams also advanced....
lead_paragraph: Djokovic dominated both tiebreakers at the BNP Paribas Open on Friday, setting up a semifinal against Nadal. Serena Williams also advanced.

headline.print_headline: Novak Djokovic to Meet Rafael Nadal in Indian Wells Final; Serena Williams Advances
headline.main: Novak Djokovic to Meet Rafael Nadal in Indian Wells Semifinal
